channel.title: Guardians of the Galaxy on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Guardians of the Galaxy on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Djimon Hounsou Joins Henry Cavill in ‘Highlander’ Remake (Exclusive)
item.description: The action fantasy from Amazon MGM is proving to be a mini ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ reunion as the actor joins Dave Bautista and Karen Gillan on the call sheet.
